query:
CREATE TABLE files (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  fileName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  fileUrl VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  fileSize INT NOT NULL,
  mimeType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  module VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  uploadedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_uploadedAt (uploadedAt)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user c2qSkVB4gKtEmor.bc3c8c9ce52a --database VzNbWtRJAsr2zJAegEjRtX --execute CREATE TABLE files (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  fileName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  fileUrl VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  fileSize INT NOT NULL,
  mimeType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  module VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  uploadedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_uploadedAt (uploadedAt)
)
